p: There was a gradual decrease in LDL levels in the A. conyzoides-treated groups as against the untreated diabetic group. A significant ( p < 0.05) increase was observed in LDL levels in diabetic treated groups compared to the normal control group and diabetic group. There was an increase in HDL levels in all the treated groups as against the untreated. A significant ( p < 0.05) decrease was observed in HDL levels in the diabetic untreated group compared to the normal control.
